title: 360° VR-Based Scientific Inquiry Experience Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Learners are not familiar with smartphone-based VR experiences but can perform basic operations; the goal is to deepen scientific inquiry and improve real-world application skills

learning_goals: Ability to observe scientific phenomena and explain core principles in a 360° VR environment
Reproduction of actual science experiment processes step-by-step in 360° video-based simulations
Understanding of complex scientific concepts in spatial and visual contexts through immersive learning experiences

resources: 360° VR Content Production Equipment (Smartphone Mount, 360° Camera, etc.)
VR Headset or Cardboard Viewer (1 per Learner)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
